domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
@Nigel_Farage Maybe lockdown isn't the best time for frog face to chunter on about the hordes of illegal immigrants coming into the UK. The background of a completely empty beach hardly helps.

This sort of nonsense seems now to be part of a bygone age. Covid-19 has shown how unimportant it is
